name: mysql-injection
description: ## Install MySQL and start the server:     <link>https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-mysql-on-ubuntu-20-04</link> ## Create DB user and table: ```mysql CREATE DATABASE `database_injection`; CREATE USER 'indie'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'vaccineChip'; GRANT PRIVILEGE ON `database_injection` TO 'indie'@'localhost'; ``` ## Create table with dummy data: ```mysql CREATE TABLE `database_injection`.`agents`  (	     `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,      `name` CHAR(40),     `net_worth` bigint ); ``` ```mysql INSERT INTO `database_injection`.`agents` (name,net_worth) VALUES ("Mark Zuckerberg",100000000000); INSERT INTO `database_injection`.`agents` (name) VALUES ("Bill Gates",129000000000); INSERT INTO `database_injection`.`agents` (name) VALUES ("Jeff Bezos",184600000000); INSERT INTO `database_injection`.`agents` (name) VALUES ("Elom Musk",199900000000); INSERT INTO `database_injection`.`agents` (name) VALUES ("Me (Dariusz)",17); ```
author: Dariusz Korolczuk
